name: Unhoppy Infinite
description:
After the events of Unhoppy, the frog Queen started to have nightmares about the little girl chasing her. So it's your turn to help her get away form that pesky little girl!

-This is a fangame and not related to the original unhoppy-

background sprites by: LimeZu on Serene Village Revamped / https://limezu.itch.io/serenevillagerevamped
